TopicTitle: The final Eve assessment: Surviving for HOURS with only a oxygen supply!

Articles.Content:
Atmospheric pressure at Eve Sea Level: 73.47974700196106 pounds per square inch (PSI) / 5 atmospheres

Max temperature on Eve: 302 F

Average temperature on Eve: Just 131 F!

Min temperature on Eve: -40.36 F

Atmo Composition: 62.17% CO2, 36.54% nitrogen, and 1.03% argon
